title: Your weekend stars
text:
See what the weekend stars have in store for you.

WEEKEND OCTOBER 12-13, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ****

Expect the sparks to fly, as the Aries Full Moon fires up personal projects and highlights your red-hot romantic side. Travel, education and joint ventures are particularly favoured.

TAURUS April 21-May 21****

Strive to get the balance right between being assertive and being cooperative. It’s also time to write, paint, play music or do other activities that draw on the richness of your imaginative world within.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ****

When it comes to an adventurous friend or acquaintance – you ain’t seen nothing yet! The fiery Full Moon also gives you a welcome energy boost so you can manifest and complete a cherished dream.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

Expect professional or personal dramas this weekend, as the fiery Full Moon activates your work and home zones. You’ll pick up energy like a sponge, so try to fraternise with positive and proactive people.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ****

Travel, communication and social media will be lively this weekend Leo. The fiery Full Moon boosts your ability to impress influential people, both in person and online. So make the most of it!

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Sunday night’s Full Moon shines a bright spotlight on money matters, especially joint finances. Plus make it a priority to surround yourself with creative people who know where they’re going.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ***

The Full Moon stirs up relationships – whether of the romantic or platonic variety. So expect the unexpected! And do your best to find a slice of weekend harmony somewhere pleasant and peaceful.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ***

Imaginative ideas and hidden obsessions are likely to go into overdrive this weekend, when the Full Moon fires up your unconscious mind. So do your best to keep things in perspective Scorpio.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ****

The Full Moon falls in your drama zone so expect some ups and downs this weekend, especially with children, teenagers or friends. Jupiter also boosts your confidence, optimism and ambition.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ***

Be prepared for a domestic drama or a family fiasco, as Sunday night’s Full Moon highlights your home zone. Plus strive to get the balance right between your personal and professional responsibilities.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

Under the fiery glow of a speedy Full Moon, you’ll feel particularly restless and impulsive. So take extra care when driving and walking near traffic. Absolutely no distractions Aquarius!

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Money matters could come to a head, as you realise your wish-list and your bank balance are heading in opposite directions. So it’s time to find creative ways to boost cash flow and re-design your dreams.

SATURDAY

YOUR DAY

Romantic and platonic relationships will be unpredictable today.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You are a gracious and sociable soul. 2020 is the year to be more mindful of the feelings and needs of others.

SUNDAY

YOUR DAY

There’s a fiery Full Moon and emotions are high, so pace yourself.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

The planets encourage you to bring more spontaneity and fun into your usual routine.

But the more you criticise others, the more difficult the year will be.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the weekend stars have in store for you.
